## ReadableGivety interface

Read the state of the Givety protocol.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ReadableGivety 
```

## Remarks

Implemented by [EthersGivety](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.md)<!-- -->.

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [getCollateralSurplusBalance(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getcollateralsurplusbalance.md) | Get the amount of leftover collateral available for withdrawal by an address. |
|  [getFees()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getfees.md) | Get a calculator for current fees. |
|  [getFrontendStatus(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getfrontendstatus.md) | Check whether an address is registered as a Givety frontend, and what its kickback rate is. |
|  [getLiquidityMiningGVTYReward(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getliquiditymininggvtyreward.md) | Get the amount of GVTY earned by an address through mining liquidity. |
|  [getLiquidityMiningStake(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getliquidityminingstake.md) | Get the amount of GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens currently staked by an address in liquidity mining. |
|  [getGVTYBalance(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getgvtybalance.md) | Get the amount of GVTY held by an address. |
|  [getGVTYStake(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getgvtystake.md) | Get the current state of an GVTY Stake. |
|  [getGUSDBalance(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getgusdbalance.md) | Get the amount of GUSD held by an address. |
|  [getGUSDInStabilityPool()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getgusdinstabilitypool.md) | Get the total amount of GUSD currently deposited in the Stability Pool. |
|  [getNumberOfTroves()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getnumberoftroves.md) | Get number of Troves that are currently open. |
|  [getPrice()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getprice.md) | Get the current price of the native currency (e.g. Give) in USD. |
|  [getRemainingLiquidityMiningGVTYReward()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getremainingliquiditymininggvtyreward.md) | Get the remaining GVTY that will be collectively rewarded to liquidity miners. |
|  [getRemainingStabilityPoolGVTYReward()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getremainingstabilitypoolgvtyreward.md) | Get the remaining GVTY that will be collectively rewarded to stability depositors. |
|  [getStabilityDeposit(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getstabilitydeposit.md) | Get the current state of a Stability Deposit. |
|  [getTotal()](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettotal.md) | Get the total amount of collateral and debt in the Givety system. |
|  [getTotalRedistributed()](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettotalredistributed.md) | Get the total collateral and debt per stake that has been liquidated through redistribution. |
|  [getTotalStakedGVTY()](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettotalstakedgvty.md) | Get the total amount of GVTY currently staked. |
|  [getTotalStakedGivTokens()](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettotalstakedunitokens.md) | Get the total amount of GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens currently staked in liquidity mining. |
|  [getTrove(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettrove.md) | Get the current state of a Trove. |
|  [getTroveBeforeRedistribution(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettrovebeforeredistribution.md) | Get a Trove in its state after the last direct modification. |
|  [getTroves(params)](./lib-base.readablegivety.gettroves_1.md) | Get a slice from the list of Troves. |
|  [getGivTokenAllowance(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getunitokenallowance.md) | Get the liquidity mining contract's allowance of a holder's GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens. |
|  [getGivTokenBalance(address)](./lib-base.readablegivety.getunitokenbalance.md) | Get the amount of GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens held by an address. |
